name: Practical Google Search Orchestration
description: Performs a Google search using the HTTPAdapter - demonstrates proper URL construction

search_term.description: The search term to look up on Google

input_query.description: The search term that was input

http_response.description: Complete HTTP response from Google search

response_status.description: HTTP status code from the response

response_body.description: The HTML response body from Google
